item.title: News App Summarizer ('Start the Ripple')
item.description: Positive News App - ‘Start The Ripple’ Video Demo: Description: This is a positive news application built with Python, Flask, HTML, CSS, Jinja, and multiple Python libraries and APIs. Its purpose is to deliver uplifting and inspiring news by aggregating articles and videos from various niches. Positive News Application This is a positive news application built with Python, Flask, HTML, CSS, Jinja, and multiple Python libraries and APIs. Its purpose is to deliver uplifting and inspiring news by aggregating articles and videos from various niches.

item.title: Resume Keyword Analyzer
item.description: Resume Keyword Analyzer #### Video Demo: <URL HERE> #### Description: A Python application that determines the ratio of keywords from a job description compared to a user's resume text file Overview The goal of this project was to enhance familiarity with Python and explore a couple of Python libraries through the development of a practical application. Resume Keyword Analyzer is designed to help users optimize their resumes for specific job descriptions.
